<p>All edibles can be classified thus: date food and non-date food. <strong>Yakitori skewers </strong>tend toward the latter camp. However, if you can work your way around a chuan&rsquo;r, <strong>Tori Ton</strong>&rsquo;s dimmed mood lighting and bench seating makes it the <strong>perfect romantic spot</strong> for hip kids who aren&rsquo;t afraid to get a little inelegant. This new venture from owner <strong>Issey Yamakawa</strong> is just as classy as his last (Tori Tei), with similar offerings.</p>
